segments.text: I don ’ t think I can take another semester of this dorm food .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I know what you mean , it leaves a lot to be desired .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Sure , like taste , variety , nutritional value , what I should do is move into an apartment off campus where I can cook for myself .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: You know how hard it is to find a decent place at this time of year ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: You should be able to find something comfortable in town , though that would be kind of far from school .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I got a car , so the distance wouldn ’ t really be a problem .
segments.speaker: S1
